verses.name: Leviticus 6:1
verses.text: And the Lord spake unto Moses, saying,

verses.name: Leviticus 6:2
verses.text: If a soul sin, and commit a trespass against the Lord, and lie unto his neighbour in that which was delivered him to keep, or in fellowship, or in a thing taken away by violence, or hath deceived his neighbour;

verses.name: Leviticus 6:3
verses.text: Or have found that which was lost, and lieth concerning it, and sweareth falsely; in any of all these that a man doeth, sinning therein:
